description: This table contains documentation regarding the verification of safety equipment locations when using lasers.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LSC_SFTY_EQP_VER_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used to document if the location of laser safety equipment has been verified.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
